009package Ch23_ImageMatching;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
016import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
017import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
018import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
019import imagingbook.common.image.matching.ChamferMatcher;
020import imagingbook.common.image.matching.DistanceNorm;
021
022
023/**
024 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the {@link ChamferMatcher} class.
025 * The active (search) image is assumed to be binary (not checked).
026 * The reference (template) image is selected interactively by the user.
027 * 
028 * @author WB
029 * @version 2014-04-20
030 */
031public class Chamfer_Matching_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
032        
033        private ImagePlus imgI = null;
034        private ImagePlus imgR = null;
035
036    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
037        this.imgI = imp;
038        return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES;
039    }
040
041    public void run(ImageProcessor ipI) {
042                if (!showDialog() || imgR == null) {
043                        return;
044                }
045                
046                ByteProcessor I = ipI.convertToByteProcessor();                                 // search image I
047        ByteProcessor R = imgR.getProcessor().convertToByteProcessor(); // reference image R
048        
049        // TODO: better initialize matcher with reference image R?
050        ChamferMatcher matcher = new ChamferMatcher(I, DistanceNorm.L2);
051        float[][] Qa = matcher.getMatch(R);
052        
053        FloatProcessor Q = new FloatProcessor(Qa);
054                (new ImagePlus("Match of " + imgI.getTitle(), Q)).show();
055    }
056 
057    private boolean showDialog() {
058        ImagePlus[] openImages = IjUtils.getOpenImages(true, imgI);
059                if (openImages.length == 0) {
060                        IJ.error("No other images are open.");
061                        return false;
062                }
063                
064                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
065                String[] titles = IjUtils.getImageShortTitles(openImages);
066                gd.addChoice("Reference image:", titles, titles[0]); // TODO: consider gd.addImageChoice()
067                
068                gd.showDialog();
069                if (gd.wasCanceled())
070                        return false;
071                
072                imgR = openImages[gd.getNextChoiceIndex()];
073                return true;
074    }
075                
076}
